title: After Getting Her Bra Twanged, A Young Girl Punched Her Classmate
subtitle: An angry mother supposedly delivered a scathing response to school officials after her daughter was punished for punching a classmate who snapped her bra.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: An angry mother delivered a scathing response to school officials after her daughter was punished for punching a classmate who snapped her bra.
